member.name: T:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationRequest
member.summary: Contains data required to make a loan calculation.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationRequest.LoanAmount
member.summary: Amount of money that client wants to loan.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationRequest.LoanDuration
member.summary: Length of a loan measured in months. It equals number of loan installments. Accept full months only.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationResponse.MonthlyCost
member.summary: Money to be paid each month.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationResponse.TotalInterstsFees
member.summary: Total amount of all fees related to interests.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCalculationResponse.TotalAdministrativeFees
member.summary: Total amount of administration fees. Administrative fees are not included in monthly cost. It is paid on loan startup.

member.name: T:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCustomCalculationRequest
member.summary: Contains data required to make a custom loan calculation, where more data must be provided.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCustomCalculationRequest.AnnualInterestRate
member.summary: Annual interest rate in percents, e.g. 5 means 5%.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCustomCalculationRequest.AdministrationFeePercent
member.summary: Administartion fee that needs to be paid, represented as percent of LoanAmount.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCustomCalculationRequest.AdministrationFeeMaxValue
member.summary: Maximum value of administration fee that can be paid. When not provided, there will be no limit.

member.name: P:AwesomeBankingApp.Api.WebContracts.Loan.LoanCustomCalculationRequest.InterestRateCalculationFrequency
member.summary: Interest rate calculation frequency. Possible values are: Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly
